description: Colin from Fire in the Hole... It takes awhile, but Colin finally gives in and Cole takes his tight ass to new levels. The other boys stand by and cheer Colin on ... Once Cole is finally in Colin gives out the sweetest, sexiest moans while he sucks on Trevor. Cole is long stroking Colin's ass by now and Colin is sweating. The moans alone are enough to send you over the edge as Colin takes it like a champ.
title: Colin
